products.title: Phone
products.description: A high-end smartphone with a sleek design, featuring a powerful processor, high-resolution display, and long battery life.

products.title: Laptop
products.description: A powerful laptop with a sleek design, featuring a high-resolution display, long battery life, and a fast processor.

products.title: Tablet
products.description: A lightweight tablet with a vivid display, ideal for media consumption and casual gaming.

reviews.comment: Perfect for watching movies and browsing.

products.title: Smartwatch
products.description: A sleek smartwatch with fitness tracking features, notifications, and a customizable watch face.

reviews.comment: Great for tracking workouts and notifications.

products.title: Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling headphones with high-quality sound, comfortable ear cups, and long battery life.

reviews.comment: Amazing sound quality, blocks out all noise.
Very comfortable for long listening sessions.
